properties.name: gg.jte.usePrecompiledTemplates
properties.description: You can precompile the templates for faster startup and rendering. To use this you need to include the Maven or Gradle Plugin: https://jte.gg/pre-compiling/

properties.name: gg.jte.developmentMode
properties.description: You can enable developmentMode so that the jte file watcher will watch for changes in templates and recompile them.

properties.name: gg.jte.templateLocation
properties.description: You can change the location where jte expects the templates to compile

properties.name: gg.jte.templateSuffix
properties.description: You can configure the file suffix of jte templates the compiler resolves
